title: Refresh landing-page profile logo and favicon to latest uploaded image

requirements.summary: Regenerate the landing-page hero profile/logo image asset (same path) to match the newly uploaded picture.
acceptanceCriteria: The landing page hero logo ( in frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx) visually matches the newly uploaded image.
The hero logo continues to load from /assets/generated/kvr-hospital-profile.dim_512x512.png (no broken image).
The updated profile/logo image is square and looks good at the existing hero sizes (w-32/h-32 and w-40/h-40).

file_operations.description: Replace/regenerate this generated profile image asset using the newly uploaded source image "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg" while keeping the same filename and 512x512 square output so existing references (e.g., in frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx) remain valid.

requirements.summary: Regenerate the site favicon asset (same path) to match the newly uploaded picture.
acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab favicon visually matches the newly uploaded image.
frontend/index.html continues to reference /assets/generated/kvr-hospital-favicon.dim_32x32.png with no 404s.

file_operations.description: Replace/regenerate this generated favicon asset using the newly uploaded source image "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg" while keeping the same filename and 32x32 output so existing references (e.g., in frontend/index.html) remain valid.

requirements.summary: Ensure regenerated profile/logo and favicon derived from the new upload do not include contradictory service text (must not show “Cardiology”).
acceptanceCriteria: The final generated profile/logo image does not display the word "Cardiology" anywhere.
The final generated favicon does not display the word "Cardiology" anywhere.

file_operations.description: During regeneration, crop/retouch the image derived from "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg" so that no user-facing text reads "Cardiology" anywhere in the 512x512 profile/logo output.
During regeneration, ensure the 32x32 favicon derived from "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg" contains no visible "Cardiology" text (use cropping/retouching/clean background as needed).
